title: The effect of the gelation temperature on the structural, magnetic and magnetocaloric properties of perovskite nanoparticles manufactured using the sol–gel method
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11456-11469
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01086H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Line Karoui, Mourad Smari, Taoufik Mnasri
This study underscores the significant impact of gelation temperature variation in the sol–gel synthesis process on the physical properties of La0.8Sr0.2Mn0.8Co0.2O3 compounds.
